body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Consider all primes p such that such that for every positive integer value of n, p does not divide a concatenation of n 1s (in base 10)."}]},{"type":"text","text":"\n\n"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Find the sum of all such primes."}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1²=1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"11²=121"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"111²=12321"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1111²=1234321"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"This is a sequence. So our answer will be "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"111111111²="}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{12345678987654321}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"This is a theorem for squaring numbers which only contains 1 in every single digit"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Count how many "1's" there are and writing all the numbers from 1 to the amount (Value of how many digits there are) and back.
1²=1   "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"11²=121   "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"111²=12321   "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1111²=1234321   "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"11111²=123454321   "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"111111²=12345654321   "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1111111²=1234567654321   "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"11111111²=123456787654321   "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"111111111²=12345678987654321"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"By the way, this theorem only works for numbers under 9 digits"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
